languages.text: "Этот дух может пока не сознавать себя, но его способности... Нам надлежит... Я бы начал со ста цикла бдений у когитатора и таинства причащения..." {n}— Паскаль переводит взгляд с вас на мерцающий вид-скрин и обратно, будто борясь с собой.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Этот дух может пока не сознавать себя, но его способности... Нам надлежит... Я бы начал со ста цикла бдений у когитатора и таинства причащения..." {n}— Паскаль переводит взгляд с вас на мерцающий вид-скрин и обратно, будто борясь с собой.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "This spirit may not possess self-awareness yet, but its capabilities... We should... I would like to start with a hundred-cycle vigil at the cogitator and a rite of communion..." {n}Pasqal looks back and forth between the glowing vid-screen and you, embroiled in some internal conflict.{/n}

traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「この精霊は自己認識がないのかもしれないが…しかしこの能力は…我々は…私はまず考算機で100サイクルの警戒と聖餐の儀式から始めたい…」{n}パスカルは内心で葛藤しながら光るスクリーンとあなたを交互に見た。{/n}
languages.original_text: "This spirit may not possess self-awareness yet, but its capabilities... We should... I would like to start with a hundred-cycle vigil at the cogitator and a rite of communion..." {n}Pasqal looks back and forth between the glowing vid-screen and you, embroiled in some internal conflict.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「この精霊は自己認識がないのかもしれないが…しかしこの能力は…我々は…私はまず考算機で100サイクルの警戒と聖餐の儀式から始めたい…」{n}パスカルは内心で葛藤しながら光るスクリーンとあなたを交互に見た。{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “这个机魂可能还没有自我意识，但它的能力……我们应该……我打算先在沉思者那里守夜一百个周期，然后举行交流仪式……”{n}帕斯卡在发光的视讯屏幕和你之间来回看了看，内心陷入了某种挣扎。{/n}
languages.original_text: "This spirit may not possess self-awareness yet, but its capabilities... We should... I would like to start with a hundred-cycle vigil at the cogitator and a rite of communion..." {n}Pasqal looks back and forth between the glowing vid-screen and you, embroiled in some internal conflict.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “这个机魂可能还没有自我意识，但它的能力……我们应该……我打算先在思考器那里守夜一百个周期，然后举行交流仪式……”{n}帕斯卡在发光的视讯屏幕和你之间来回看了看，内心陷入了某种挣扎。{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Dieser Geist besitzt vielleicht noch keine Selbsterkenntnis, doch seine Fähigkeiten ... Wir sollten ... Ich möchte mit einer Andacht von einhundert Zyklen beim Cogitator und einem Ritus der Kommunion beginnen ..." {n}Pasqal blickt zwischen dem leuchtenden Vid-Bildschirm und dir hin und her. Er trägt einen heftigen inneren Konflikt aus.{/n}
languages.original_text: "This spirit may not possess self-awareness yet, but its capabilities... We should... I would like to start with a hundred-cycle vigil at the cogitator and a rite of communion..." {n}Pasqal looks back and forth between the glowing vid-screen and you, embroiled in some internal conflict.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Dieser Geist besitzt vielleicht noch keine Selbsterkenntnis, doch seine Fähigkeiten ... Wir sollten ... Ich möchte mit einer Andacht von einhundert Zyklen beim Cogitator und einem Ritus der Kommunion beginnen ..." {n}Pasqal blickt zwischen dem leuchtenden Vid-Bildschirm und dir hin und her. Er trägt einen heftigen inneren Konflikt aus.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Cet esprit n'a peut-être pas encore conscience de sa propre existence, mais ses capacités... Nous devrions... J'aimerais commencer par une veillée de cent cycles au cogitateur, puis un rite de communion... » {n}Le regard de Pasqal, qui est visiblement tourmenté par un conflit intérieur, se pose tour à tour sur vous et l'écran vidéo scintillant.{/n}
languages.original_text: "This spirit may not possess self-awareness yet, but its capabilities... We should... I would like to start with a hundred-cycle vigil at the cogitator and a rite of communion..." {n}Pasqal looks back and forth between the glowing vid-screen and you, embroiled in some internal conflict.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Cet esprit n'a peut-être pas encore conscience de sa propre existence, mais ses capacités... Nous devrions... J'aimerais commencer par une veillée de cent cycles au cogitateur, puis un rite de communion... » {n}Le regard de Pasqal, qui est visiblement tourmenté par un conflit intérieur, se pose tour à tour sur vous et l'écran vidéo scintillant.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Puede que este espíritu no posea aún conciencia de sí mismo, pero sus capacidades... Deberíamos... Me gustaría empezar con una vigilia de cien ciclos en el cogitador y luego un ritual de comunión...». {n}Pasqal pasea la mirada de la brillante videopantalla a ti, atribulado por algún conflicto interno.{/n}
languages.original_text: "This spirit may not possess self-awareness yet, but its capabilities... We should... I would like to start with a hundred-cycle vigil at the cogitator and a rite of communion..." {n}Pasqal looks back and forth between the glowing vid-screen and you, embroiled in some internal conflict.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Puede que este espíritu no posea aún conciencia de sí mismo, pero sus capacidades... Deberíamos... Me gustaría empezar con una vigilia de cien ciclos en el cogitador y luego un ritual de comunión...». {n}Pasqal pasea la mirada de la brillante videopantalla a ti, atribulado por algún conflicto interno.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Bu ruh, henüz öz farkındalık geliştirmemiş olabilir ancak kabiliyetleri... Biz... Ben kavramsayarda yüz döngülük ibadetin yanı sıra iştirak ayini başlatmak istiyorum..." {n}Pasqal'ın bakışları, seninle parlayan video ekranı arasında gidip geliyor. Bir tür iç çatışma yaşadığı oldukça aşikâr.{/n}

I would like to start with a hundred-cycle vigil at the cogitator and a rite of communion..." {n}Pasqal looks back and forth between the glowing vid-screen and you, embroiled in some internal conflict.{/n}
